import React, { useRef, useState } from "react" import { Form, Button, Card, Alert } from "react-bootstrap" import {useAuth} from './contexts/AuthContext' function Signup() { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const passwordConfirmRef = useRef() const {signup} = useAuth() function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() signup(emailRef.currrent.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return ( <>

) } export default Signup
